ARABIC: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُۥ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِى فَقَعُوا۟ لَهُۥ سَٰجِدِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When I have formed him and breathed My Ruh into him, fall down in prostration to him!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And when I have made him and have breathed into him of My spirit. Fall down in homage before him."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: After I have created him and breathed into him of My spirit, fall you down, prostrating yourselves to him.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and when I give it proper shape and blow My spirit into it, bow down in prostration to him,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “So when I have perfected him and breathed into him a spirit from Myself, (you all) fall down before him in prostration.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, when I have fashioned him and breathed into him (his) soul created by Me, then you fall down prostrate to him."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So when I have made him complete and breathed into him of My spirit, then fall down making obeisance to him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: When I have shaped him, and breathed My spirit in him, fall you down, bowing before him!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when I have fashioned him and breathed into him of My Spirit, then fall down before him prostrate,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and when I have formed him fully and breathed My spirit into him, prostrate yourselves before him."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then when I have formed him and breathed into him of My spirit, fall down before him prostrate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My spirit, then fall down in prostration before him.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When I have fashioned him (in due proportion) and breathed into him of My spirit, fall ye down in obeisance unto him."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So when I have fashioned him and breathed into him (his) soul created by Me, then you fall down prostrate to him."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: after I have shaped him and breathed of My spirit (I created) into him, fall down prostrate before him'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When I have formed him, and breathed into him of My spirit, fall prostrate before him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:72] So when I have proportioned him, completed him, and breathed in him, [when I have] caused to flow [therein], My spirit, so that he becomes a living [being] — the addition of ‘the spirit’ to Adam is an honour for him; the ‘spirit’ is a subtle body that gives life to a human being by permeating him — then fall down in prostration before him!’ — a prostration of salutation [that is actually] a bow.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when I have fashioned him) and when I have gathered his creation (and breathed into him of My spirit) and placed in him My spirit, (then fall down before him prostrate) then prostrate before him,
